system.effect: Reduce Range by Half, Increase Penetration by 2. Gain Tearing Quality. Average sized target or smaller must make +10 Toughness Test when hit or be knocked prone. If shotgun, lose Scatter Qualiy. If Bolt weapon, change damage type to Impact.

description.value:
Damage/Effect: Reduce Range by Half, Increase Penetration by 2. Gain Tearing Quality. Average sized target or smaller must make +10 Toughness Test when hit or be knocked prone. If shotgun, lose Scatter Qualiy. If Bolt weapon, change damage type to Impact.

Qualities: Tearing, Scatter (lose)
